job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and modernize existing products, rather than the core development, fine-tuning, or deployment of generative AI models or predictive systems. While it mentions 'generative AI journey' and 'AI-driven innovations', it lacks specific details on building RAG systems, fine-tuning LLMs, or developing complex AI models. The focus appears to be on leveraging AI as a tool for software engineering tasks like coding, error detection, and feature development, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile's definition of primarily focusing on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity.

job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions developing innovative features, building scalable applications, developing back-end solutions, and enhancing product functionality, which are core software development activities.
The role involves building scalable, serverless applications and robust, cloud-native applications, which are key aspects of modern software development.
The description highlights the need to develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions, a fundamental software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions

job_tasks.justification: Conducting code reviews and collaborating to ensure best practices are standard software development practices.
Integrating AI-driven solutions into cloud services is a software development task that involves connecting different systems and functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services

job_tasks.justification: The role involves modernizing strategic product lines and bringing the product portfolio into the modern world, indicating a need to understand business goals and product strategy.
The description mentions leveraging AI to craft intelligent solutions for a 100+ product portfolio, implying a need to understand the business context of these products.
job_tasks.phrase: craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'generative AI journey' suggests some involvement with generative AI, though the specifics are not detailed.
job_tasks.phrase: embark on a generative AI journey

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum', which implies that the role is not heavily focused on traditional infrastructure management, but rather on higher-level solution development.
job_tasks.phrase: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum

soft_skills.justification: The job description explicitly mentions collaborating with a global team of tech experts and conducting code reviews, which requires strong communication and collaboration skills.
soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts

soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on leveraging AI tools and engaging in a 'generative AI journey' suggests a need for continuous learning and adaptability to new technologies.
The role is described as crafting 'intelligent, forward-thinking solutions' and focusing on 'creating innovative solutions', indicating a need for innovation and taking ownership.
The description mentions using AI to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, and bug fixing, which are all problem-solving activities aimed at pragmatic outcomes.
soft_skills.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.

technologies.justification: AWS is explicitly mentioned as a technology to engage with.
The mention of 'serverless technologies' and 'cloud-native applications' indicates a reliance on cloud infrastructure and services.
The mention of 'cloud-native applications' indicates a reliance on cloud infrastructure and services.
The phrase 'generative AI journey' suggests an engagement with generative AI models, although specific models are not named.
